sections.section_title: Short title and commencement.
sections.body: (1) This Act may be called the Tramways Act, 1886; and (2) It shall come into force at once.

sections.section_title: Local extent.
sections.body: (1) It extends in the first instance to the Punjab and the North-West Frontier Province. (2) This Act may by notification in the official Gazette be extended to the whole or any part of the said territories by the Provincial Government concerned.

sections.section_title: Definitions.
sections.body: In this Act, unless there is something repugnant in the subject or context, various definitions are provided for terms such as 'local authority', 'road', 'road-authority', 'circle', 'tramway', 'order', 'promoter', 'undertaking', 'carriage', 'toll', 'lessee', 'District Magistrate', 'District Court', 'Collector', 'prescribed', and 'Government'.

chapters.chapter_title: Orders Authorizing the Construction of Tramways

sections.section_title: Application for and consent necessary to making of order.
sections.body: (1) The application can be made by the local authority of the circle with the consent of the road-authority or by any person with the consent of the local authority and road-authority. (2) A local authority shall not make an application for an order unless it has been approved in the prescribed manner.

sections.section_title: Consent of local or road-authority not necessary in certain cases.
sections.body: When it is proposed to lay a tramway in two or more circles, and a local authority or road-authority does not consent, the Government may still make an order authorizing the construction.

sections.section_title: Procedure for making order.
sections.body: The Government shall consider the application and, if satisfied, publish a notice in the official Gazette regarding the proposed order.

sections.section_title: Contents of order.
sections.body: The order shall contain the details necessary for the construction of the tramway.
